Homework list - Archiving unvisitied materials

This is a long list of yet visited, and yet digested materials for me to chew slowly.

Book / Articles

遅刻の誕生

Artists

Yukinori Yanagi - Fukuoka born Yale graduate sculptor - follow ants to make drawing

Survival Reserch Laboratory - Mechatronic performance art group

John Chamberlains crushed car - transformation

TAKIS - Panayiotis Vassilakis, known as TAKIS - Greek - nice sculptures with magnets

Jason Rhoades - aesthesetised electronic mess - Erik style

Raphael Kim - work on Microbe

Ralph Becker - electronic installations

Philadelphia Wireman - unknown artist responsible for approximately 1,200 small-scale wire-frame sculptures that were found in Philadelphia
